ceci-text-input/description: Sends text you've entered when you press the button.
ceci-text-input/attributes/inputname/des: The name of this field, helpful when saving data.
ceci-text-input/attributes/buttonlabel/d: The label on the submit button
ceci-text-input/attributes/placeholderte: The text you want your input field to show by default.
ceci-text-input/attributes/showbutton/de: Shows a button that broadcasts the input value when pressed.
ceci-text-input/attributes/resetonsubmit: Clears the input field when it is submitted
ceci-text-input/attributes/submitempty/d: Submit the value of the input even if it's blank.
